svg.title: Knotwork
svg.desc: Construction of knotwork on 1/2 inch grid graph paper. From the book "Mandala, Journey to the Centre", by Bailey Cunningham.
svg.title: Entrelacs
svg.desc: Construstion d'un entrelacs sur du papier quadrill√©. Extraite du livre "Mandala, Voyage vers le centre", de Bailey Cunningham.
